Verifies that Overlay.setShowViewportSizeOnResize works.
Initial device metrics:
[
  {
    "name": "reset",
    "data": {
      "deviceScaleFactor": 0.6666666865348816,
      "emulationScaleFactor": 1,
      "pageScaleFactor": 1,
      "viewportSize": {
        "width": 800,
        "height": 600
      },
      "visualViewportSize": {
        "width": 800,
        "height": 600
      },
      "pageZoomFactor": 1,
      "scrollX": 0,
      "scrollY": 0
    }
  }
]

[
  {
    "name": "setOverlay",
    "data": "viewportSize"
  },
  {
    "name": "reset",
    "data": {
      "deviceScaleFactor": 0.6666666865348816,
      "emulationScaleFactor": 1,

        "width": 500,
